aboutText1: Embrace the way of the samurai with intuitive controls, elegant design, and a sharp focus on the classic logic puzzle.

newGameText: Select a difficulty to start a new puzzle.
nakedSingleExplanation: This cell is the only one in its row, column, or box where this number can possibly go, based on the numbers already placed.
hiddenSingleExplanation: While other numbers might fit in this cell, this number can *only* go in this specific cell within its row, column, or box.
hintNextStep: Click here to reveal the number.
noPuzzleError: Sorry, no puzzles are available for this mode and difficulty yet.
